channel.title: Comments on: Interviewing Jan Stinchcomb, Author of THE BLOOD TRAIL
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Michele Rappoport
item.dc:creator: Michele Rappoport
item.description: I was introduced to Jan Stinchcomb via her micro story "Teacup Werewolf." It was so vivid it convinced me I have one of these magical creatures living in my own cupboard. Such imagination!
item.content:encoded: I was introduced to Jan Stinchcomb via her micro story “Teacup Werewolf.” It was so vivid it convinced me I have one of these magical creatures living in my own cupboard. Such imagination!
